thread.title_full: TV Talk-Hold On To Your Seats, it's THURSDAY!

title: TV Talk-Hold On To Your Seats, it's THURSDAY!
text:
TV Talk-Hold On To Your Seats, it's THURSDAY! All New TGIT tonight! Post to Facebook TV Talk-Hold On To Your Seats, it's THURSDAY! All New TGIT tonight!  //fcnews.tv/1FJq8aB   Join the Conversation To   TV Talk-Hold On To Your Seats, it's THURSDAY! Lori Dorman, 6:21 p.m. EDT October 1, 2015 It's Shonda Rhimes time on WJXX ABC-25! Thursdays at 9 p.m. on WJXX ABC-25 (Photo: ABC) 
Buckle up for an all-new TGIT lineup tonight on ABC 25! <!--iframe--> 
8 p.m. brings an ALL NEW Grey's Anatomy. April ends up in the isolation unit her first day back from the Middle East after Arizona notices a rash on her back. <!--iframe--> 
Then Gladiators Unite! Scandal takes over at 9 p.m. A new case takes Olivia out of D.C. and away from Fitz; Abby receives unexpected guidance. <!--iframe--> 
And at 10 p.m., investigators try to pin a new charge on the wealthy siblings Annalise is representing on How to Get Away with Murder. 
Drama, drama and more drama on WTLV NBC-12!
